*** 

This vignette discusses how to add a new model family to [`ramp.library`](https://github.com/dd-harp/ramp.library) that can be used by [`ramp.xde`](https://github.com/dd-harp/ramp.xde). There are specific instructions for new models of human infection and immunity [({\cal XH})](X-How_to_Add_Model.html); adult mosquito ecology and infection dynamics [${\cal MYZ}$](MYZ-How_To_Add_Model.html); and mosquito ecology [$\cal L$](L-How_To_Add_Model.html). 

This vignette covers general procedures.
